name: 方博杰
objective: 本課程著重教導學生閱讀文章，並藉由文章訓練學生字彙建構、語言解析及聽力會話、思維啟發能力。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
schedule:
WEEK	DATE	        CONTENT	                                          ASSIGNMENTS
			
1	Feb. 26 / Feb. 28	Syllabus / No Class	
2	Mar. 05 / Mar. 07	File 7 A (Infinitive) / File 7 B (Gerunds)	
3	Mar. 12 / Mar. 14	File 7 C (Have to, must, can’t) / Review	Workbook
4	Mar. 19 / Mar. 21	File 8 A (Should) / File 8 B (1st conditional)	
5	Mar. 26 / Mar. 28	File 8 C (Possessive pronouns) / Review 	Workbook
6	Apr. 02 / Apr. 04	File 9 A (2nd conditional) / No class	
7	Apr. 09 / Apr. 11	File 9 B (PP for, since) / File 9 C (PP or SP)	
8	Apr. 16 / Apr. 18	Practice and revise - Workbook
9	Apr. 23 / Apr. 25	Mid-term week 	Midterm exam
10	Apr. 30 / May. 02	File 10 A (passive) / File 10 B (used to)	
11	May 07 / May 09	File 10 C (might) / Review	Workbook
12	May 14 / May 16	File 11 A (expressing movement)
                                        File 11 B (word order of phrasal verbs)	
13	May 21 / May 23	File 11 C (so, neither + aux) / Review	Workbook
14	May 28 / May 30	File 12 A (past perfect) 
                                        File 12 B (reported speech)	
15	June 04 / June 06	File 12 C (questions w/out aux) / Review	Workbook
16	June 11 / June 13	Practice and revise	Workbook
17	June 18 / June 20	No class / Practice	
18	June 25 / June 27	Finals week - Final exam
scorePolicy:
Attendance and Participation (class and group discussions) – 30%
Homework and assignments – 30%
Midterm and Final Exam – 40%
materials:
American English File 2/e Student Multi-Pack 2B (w/Oxford Online Skills & iChecker)  
(附線上練習密碼，一經刮開恕不退換)
